props.description: The name of the input element.
props.title: name

props.description: Sets toggle state to activated or deactivated.
props.title: selected

props.description: Text to be rendered inside the component
props.title: label

props.description: The content of the icons. Receives an object with 2 optional props, "unchecked" and "checked" both as ReactNode.
props.title: icons

props.description: Specifies the size of the toggle, controlling its dimensions.
props.title: size

props.description: Specifies whether the radiobutton is in error state
props.title: error
